auopt_list.0: Do not check for updates automatically
auopt_list.1: Automatically check for updates. If there are updates, please display them here
auopt_list.2: Automatically check for updates. If there are updates, please notify me (recommended)
auopt_list.3: Automatically check for updates. If there are updates, apply on the next reload. (default)
auopt_list.5: Always use the latest version, even if there is no update (not recommended)

needReloadToApply: A reload is required to apply changes.
newerVersionDetected: A newer version has been detected.
